sentences.sContent: The movie deals with injustices suffered by Native Americans.
sentences.sCn: 这部电影讲述印第安人受到的不公正待遇。

sentences.sContent: He had developed a deep sense of social injustice.
sentences.sCn: 他深深感到社会的不公。

sentences.sContent: ...in effect turning a blind eye to the injustice in the education system...
...we reveal just how deep this injustice runs...
...we generalize it and fail to see the larger picture—that there's injustice in every aspect of American life...

trans.tranOther: a situation in which people are treated very unfairly and not given their rights
